description.@en: Blood oozes from your hand, dripping on the ground and congealing beneath your feet.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, your hand begins to weep Ã†theric blood. For the Duration of the spell, foes who attempt to target you with Attack Actions or Perilous Stunts must Resist with a Resolve Test or suffer a -20 Base Chance to strike you.
